languages.text: "Джай продолжает кутаться в пестрые краски привычных масок, меняет цвета по желанию, словно одежды. Но глубоко внутри ее сердца трепещет пугливый росток цвета дымчатой лилии. Грязный, опаленный, присыпанный пеплом... Зато настоящий. Кто знает, быть может, однажды Джай и позволит ему прорасти".

traits.locale_text: "Джай продолжает кутаться в пестрые краски привычных масок, меняет цвета по желанию, словно одежды. Но глубоко внутри ее сердца трепещет пугливый росток цвета дымчатой лилии. Грязный, опаленный, присыпанный пеплом... Зато настоящий. Кто знает, быть может, однажды Джай и позволит ему прорости".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Jae continues to envelop herself in the variegation of her habitual masks, changing her colours at will like so many garments. But deep within her heart trembles a timid seedling the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae will allow it to grow and blossom."
languages.original_text: "Джай продолжает кутаться в пестрые краски привычных масок, меняет цвета по желанию, словно одежды. Но глубоко внутри ее сердца трепещет пугливый росток цвета дымчатой лилии. Грязный, опаленный, присыпанный пеплом... Зато настоящий. Кто знает, быть может, однажды Джай и позволит ему прорасти".

traits.locale_text: "Jae continues to envelop herself in the variegation of her habitual masks, changing her colours at will like so many garments. But deep within her heart trembles a timid sprout the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae allows it to grow and blossom."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

But deep within her heart trembles a timid seedling the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae will allow it to grow and blossom."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “婕伊依然藏在她习以为常的无数面具之中，像换衣服一样，随意地更改着她自己的颜色。但在她内心深处，有一株弱小的幼苗在瑟瑟发抖。它的颜色就像烟熏过的百合一样，脏污不堪、满身是灰，还带着烧灼的痕迹……但它是真的。或许有一天，婕伊会允许这株嫩芽茁壮成长吧，谁知道呢。”
languages.original_text: "Jae continues to envelop herself in the variegation of her habitual masks, changing her colours at will like so many garments. But deep within her heart trembles a timid seedling the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae will allow it to grow and blossom."

traits.locale_text: “婕伊依然藏在她习以为常的无数面具之中，像换衣服一样，随意地更改着她自己的颜色。但在她内心深处，有一株弱小的幼苗在瑟瑟发抖。它的颜色就像烟熏过的百合一样，脏污不堪、满身是灰，还带着烧灼的痕迹……但它是真的。或许有一天，婕伊会允许这株嫩芽茁壮成长吧，谁知道呢。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Jae continues to envelop herself in the variegation of her habitual masks, changing her colours at will like so many garments. But deep within her heart trembles a timid seedling the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae will allow it to grow and blossom."

languages.text: «Jae sigue tapándose con su habitual variedad de máscaras, cambiando de color como quien cambia de ropa. Sin embargo, en el fondo de su corazón hay ahora una semilla del color de un lirio ahumado. Está sucia, quemada y cubierta de cenizas... pero es sincera. Y quién sabe, tal vez Jae permita que germine y florezca».
languages.original_text: "Jae continues to envelop herself in the variegation of her habitual masks, changing her colours at will like so many garments. But deep within her heart trembles a timid seedling the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae will allow it to grow and blossom."

traits.locale_text: «Jae sigue tapándose con su habitual variedad de máscaras, cambiando de color como quien cambia de ropa. Sin embargo, en el fondo de su corazón hay ahora una semilla del color de un lirio ahumado. Está sucia, quemada y cubierta de cenizas... pero es sincera. Y quién sabe, tal vez Jae permita que germine y florezca».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ジェイはいつもの仮面の変化に身を包み、多くの衣服のように自由に色を変え続けています。ですが、彼女の心の奥底では、煙のようなユリの色をした臆病な苗が震えているのです。それは穢れ、焦げ、灰にまみれています…ですが、それこそが核心なのです。いつかジェイがそれを成長させ、花開かせる日が来るかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Jae continues to envelop herself in the variegation of her habitual masks, changing her colours at will like so many garments. But deep within her heart trembles a timid seedling the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae will allow it to grow and blossom."

traits.locale_text: 「ジェイはいつもの仮面の変化に身を包み、多くの衣服のように自由に色を変え続けています。ですが、彼女の心の奥底では、煙のようなユリの色をした臆病な苗が震えているのです。それは穢れ、焦げ、灰にまみれています…ですが、それこそが核心なのです。いつかジェイがそれを成長させ、花開かせる日が来るかもしれません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Jae umhüllt sich weiter mit der Variegation ihrer gewohnten Masken und verändert ihre Farben nach Belieben, als würde sie die Kleidung wechseln. Doch tief in ihrem Herzen zittert ein schwächlicher Schössling in der Farbe rauchiger Lilien. Er ist schmutzig, verbrannt, mit Asche bedeckt ... Aber er ist echt. Wer weiß, vielleicht erlaubt Jae dem Schössling eines Tages, zu wachsen und zu blühen."
languages.original_text: "Jae continues to envelop herself in the variegation of her habitual masks, changing her colours at will like so many garments. But deep within her heart trembles a timid seedling the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae will allow it to grow and blossom."

traits.locale_text: "Jae umhüllt sich weiter mit der Variegation ihrer gewohnten Masken und verändert ihre Farben nach Belieben, als würde sie die Kleidung wechseln. Doch tief in ihrem Herzen zittert ein schwächlicher Schössling in der Farbe rauchiger Lilien. Er ist schmutzig, verbrannt, mit Asche bedeckt ... Aber er ist echt. Wer weiß, vielleicht erlaubt Jae dem Schössling eines Tages, zu wachsen und zu blühen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Jae est toujours dissimulée derrière une kyrielle de masques et change de couleur comme de chemise, mais au plus profond de son cœur tremble une petite plante timide de la couleur de lys brûlés. Elle est crasseuse, calcinée et couverte de cendres... mais authentique. Qui sait, peut-être que Jae lui permettra un jour de s'épanouir ? »
languages.original_text: "Jae continues to envelop herself in the variegation of her habitual masks, changing her colours at will like so many garments. But deep within her heart trembles a timid seedling the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae will allow it to grow and blossom."

traits.locale_text: « Jae est toujours dissimulée derrière une kyrielle de masques et change de couleur comme de chemise, mais au plus profond de son cœur tremble une petite plante timide de la couleur de lys brûlés. Elle est crasseuse, calcinée et couverte de cendres... mais authentique. Qui sait, peut-être que Jae lui permettra un jour de s'épanouir ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Jae, alışılagelmiş rengârenk maskelerine bürünüp kıyafet değiştirircesine renk değiştirmeye devam ediyor. Oysa kalbinin derinliklerinde tir tir titreyen, dumanlı zambak renginde, ürkek bir fide var. Fide çepelli, yanmış, külle kaplanmış... Yine de hakiki. Kim bilir, belki bir gün Jae bu fidenin büyüyüp çiçek açmasına izin verir."
languages.original_text: "Jae continues to envelop herself in the variegation of her habitual masks, changing her colours at will like so many garments. But deep within her heart trembles a timid seedling the colour of smoky lilies. It is grimy, burnt, and covered in ash... But it is genuine. Who knows, perhaps one day Jae will allow it to grow and blossom."

traits.locale_text: "Jae, sürekli rengârenk maskelere bürünüp kıyafet değiştirircesine renk değiştirmeye devam ediyor. Oysa kalbinin derinliklerinde tir tir titreyen, dumanlı bir zambak renginde ürkek bir fide var. Üstü başı pis, yanmış, külle kaplanmış... Yine de buna rağmen hakiki. Kim bilir, belki bir gün Jae, bu fidenin büyüyüp çiçek açmasına izin verir."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
